pages.text: I... never could have expected that... something like THIS would come from slicing through a lost soul with my soulforged blade... I just hope nobody else heard that... noise. I do not need my research to be compromised, not at the brink of such a discovery... I have obtained a soul, in its absolute purest form. The power contained in this must be immense, I can feel it.

It speaks to me. Tells me it hates me. I do not care. My research is far more important than even a hundred thousand souls, let alone just one. I must experiment with it. I must find out what I can use it for. It seems to resonate with tartaric gems, the sentient sword, and other devices that use demon will. I believe I will start by investigating this.
